item.title: [DISTRELEC-7804] Set modelPrefetchMode to FALSE for some dynamic attributes.
item.description:
In the file 

/distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore-items.xml

check dynamic attributes for primitive types and Strings and add to them the following lines:

<custom-properties>
    <property name="modelPrefetchMode">
      <value>java.lang.Boolean.TRUE</value>
    </property>
  </custom-properties>
item.summary: Set modelPrefetchMode to FALSE for some dynamic attributes.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I added the custom property to the DistCodelist, Product and Category.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7754] Credit card payment - confirmation through payment bank
item.description:
After inserting credit card data (card nr, holder etc), the window with confirmation of payment using bank is appearing. Unfortunately it is NOT SCROLLABLE window, and for some banks it not possble to type the security code because opened SECURE PAYMENT bank window does not fit our webpage. Please see picture attached.

Sharepoint 135
item.summary: Credit card payment - confirmation through payment bank

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Erik, can you please have a look at this? Thx

Same as: DISTRELEC-7699 which is already fixed.
Please check

Added a vertical scroll bar if content doesn't fit inside the iframe. Also moved deprecated iframe attributes to css.

Committed to trunk.

Hi Erik, thanks!
Maybe we also need a horizontal scrollbar? Depending on the payment partner we might get other frame sizes...

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7746] Order is visible in HYBRIS, but wasnt transfered to SAP
item.description:
​Customer did an order in WEBHSOP for item 11076252
It's visible in hybris, but not visible in SAP.
also there is no SAP order nr in hybris
please see attached capture
Sharepoint 170
item.summary: Order is visible in HYBRIS, but wasnt transfered to SAP

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Neeraj

Can you please take care of this
and check if you can find anything.

This is not the first time this happened.
Can you please add a log statement, which is always logged (for every order) also on production, which includes ( Hybris order-number, SAP order-number, result of the SAP call )
This happened already: DISTRELEC-7614

Hi Rene Haemmerli | Distrelec

I did some investigation and found the only reason why ERP order no can be missing in hybris order is when sap is not transmitting the <orderId>1000110969</orderId> in the response to the order calculation request send when <simulateOrder>false</simulateOrder>. I don't find any other reason when it is possible to skip. In the final step of order calculation when simulateOrder=false we get this orderId. I checked the xml which is being captured on webshop side and didn't found this value. Here is the response from sap for this order and i didn't find this value in the response.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<ns2:class com.distrelec.webservice.sap.v1.OrderCalculationResponse
    xmlns:ns2="uri">
    <orderEntries>
        <materialNumber>16012330</materialNumber>
        <orderQuantity>3</orderQuantity>
        <freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
        <listPrice>0.11</listPrice>
        <listPriceTotal>0.33</listPriceTotal>
        <actualPrice>0.11</actualPrice>
        <actualPriceTotal>0.33</actualPriceTotal>

        </availabilityInfo>

        <freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
        <listPrice>0.11</listPrice>
        <listPriceTotal>0.66</listPriceTotal>
        <actualPrice>0.11</actualPrice>
        <actualPriceTotal>0.66</actualPriceTotal>
        <availabilityInfo>
            <availableQuantity>0</availableQuantity>
            <estimatedDeliveryDate>20150922</estimatedDeliveryDate>
        </availabilityInfo>
        <availabilityInfo>
            <availableQuantity>6</availableQuantity>
            <estimatedDeliveryDate>20150923</estimatedDeliveryDate>
        </availabilityInfo>
    </orderEntries>
    <orderEntries>

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7736] CH // Expand of product list doesn't work
item.description:
Dear all,

please go to:

  • http://www.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/laborsteckverbinder-und-zubehoer-fuer-messarbeiten/laborsteckverbinder/laborbuchsen/sicherheitslaborbuchsen-mm/c/cat-DC-83125?q=*&filter_Category3=Laborsteckverbinder&filter_Category5=Sicherheitslaborbuchsen%2C+%C3%B8+4+mm&filter_Category4=Laborbuchsen&page=1&pageSize=10

64 products were found, But if you want to expand the list or change the result page, then just 6 more will be listed.
item.summary: CH // Expand of product list doesn't work

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Will

Can you please check!
reproducable on P & Q. Will debug this functionality in my local env.

By changing the "results per page" parameter, we add the productFamilyCode as a customParameter. This is the bug here.

                        <ns2:CustomParameter>
                            <ns2:name>productFamilyCode</ns2:name>
                            <ns2:values>
                                <ns3:string>cat-DC-83125</ns3:string>
                            </ns2:values>
                        </ns2:CustomParameter>

customParameter is added here: http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20251/screenshot-1.png

I will fix it accordingly.
fixed in v4.1.0. Ready for Q deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7728] Wrong Character encoding found on Product Familiy view
item.description:
Mr. Neil Harrison has reported this issue as he observed that there is wrong character encoding for the product family view on this page

http://www.distrelec.de/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/esd-sichere-produkte/erdungsmatten/esd-tischmattensets-32-290-600x/c/cat-463151?q=*&filter_productFamilyCode=cat-463151

However when I click on the product itself and I found it has right character encoding.

http://www.distrelec.de/de/tischmatte-90-60-cm-blau-schutzkontaktstecker-eurostat-bordsmatta-bl-90x60mm-kit/p/11048714?q=*&filter_productFamilyCode=cat-463151&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Category5=ESD-Tischmattensets%2C+32-290-600X&filter_Category3=ESD-sichere+Produkte&filter_Category4=Erdungsmatten&page=1&origPageSize=50&simi=99.5









Please investigate the source of error and fix it.
item.summary: Wrong Character encoding found on Product Familiy view

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi will, please have a look, thx.
reproducable on P.

• product already wrong imported in FF: http://10.191.20.145:8080/FACT-Finder-hybris/Detail.ff?id=11048714&sid=6C3BC68297B21D69D0B726391DF72D14&uid=1692933936&site=demoshop&sourceRefKey=L4RXUwxbQ&channel=distrelec_P_7350_de_de
  • I will check now the FF DE DE export, maybe the FF import can not handle the ≤ sign
I will test on Q replacing ≤ with "& le;" for product 11048714. Lets see if this will solve the problem on FF Q.
Fix works on Q: http://test.distrelec.de/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/esd-sichere-produkte/erdungsmatten/esd-tischmattensets-32-290-600x/c/cat-463151?q=*&filter_productFamilyCode=cat-463151

Solved ticket in v4.1.0, committed to trunk. Ready for Q deployment.

This will need FULL PIM imports, because the ≤ & ≥ signs need to be by PIM import.

Note: this page should benefit from refactoring: Flag images should be aggregated into a sprite image, layout shouldn't be done by means of tables, etc. Also the current flag images doesn't have a coherent size; most of them are smaller than the displayed size, making them a bit blurred. And a few are very large, 180x180px, making for larger file sizes. Two of the flags also have transparency where the shouldn't: the white part of the Greece flag, and ditto for the Other "flag".
Links updated at old Elfa web shop start page. Tested on Q, scheduled for deployment to P tonight.

could you please provide the Contact Telephone for each country/language?

E.g: "Here you can subscribe to our fantastic News..."

  • Contact telephone: service.nav.telephone
  • Subscribe Newsletter: service.nav.subscribe

Thanks

Cheers,
Laura

Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7160] when a link ends in "..." display the full name of the link when doing a mouse over
item.description:
Hello,

In many parts of our website when a full sentence does not fit we cut the last word and use "..." instead of having line break.
When using "..." at the end of a link or text, display always via mouse over the full name of the link or text. Some examples where this occurs:

  • On the category pages
  • On the Category list above product results
  • On the navigation megaflyout

Thanks,
Laura

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7039] Delivery address validation "Packstation"
item.description:
Requirement

  • Germany ONLY: If the word "Packstation" / "packstation" appears in the shipping address, the address cannot be saved/used for checkout unless this is changed.
  • A warning should be shown to the customer: ""

Open Points:

  1. Warning message should be defined by business.
  2. Business needs to define which fields of the Address form need to be validated.
  3. Needs this to be implemented for other countries as well? If yes, translations of the warning and "Packstation" are needed.

Ticket originates from: DSUP-597
item.summary: Delivery address validation "Packstation"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Zisan, Could you please come up with answers to the open points? Thanks.

Hi Rafael,
the requirement is from Mirco Saager, i don´t know the details, Mirco is on vacation.

Hi Rafael,

now i have an answer:
Warning Message should be :

DE: Ein Versand an eine Packstation/Postfilliale ist leider nicht möglich. Bitte korrigieren Sie Ihre Anschrift.
EN: Unfortunately we cannot deliver to a Packstation/Postoffice. Please correct your address.

The following field should be checked for the Value “Packstation” or “packstation” or “Postfiliale” or “postfiliale” (see attachment field name)

Other Countries :
Verified in telephone Call with DHL-Service on 22.06.2015 there are no European Countries having Packstation-Service available.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

i.A. Mirco Saager
Leitung Service

Hi Oana,
Mirco asked me for the status of this ticket.

Hi rene,
can you please help me with this ticket? Its open since June...

@Akshay

Can you please take care of this.
can you please confirm is this applicable for Swiss -German as well.
This is only for the country Germany, so not relevant for Switzerland and Swiss-German.
Committed the required changes.Please test after next deployment.
tested, don´t work, see attachment

The fix-version 4.0.6 was wrong, correct would have been 4.5.0.
This is not yet deployed because is was not part of the hyper-care sprint.

Sorry, for the inconvenience!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7028] Suggestion layer - tracking
item.description:
The tracking of the suggestion layer is only implemented via Webtrek for the product suggestion, but there is no tracking implemented for the category suggestions, manufacture suggestions nor the search suggestions.

It seems a Fact Finder standard feature to be able to track the suggestion layer, as can be read on the pdf:

"In order to track how many users actually use the suggestion produced by the Suggest module, and therefore automatically help to optimise the suggestions, you must integrate a tracking solution. The necessary tracking parameters are already contained within the returned Search parameters URL. Therefore, normally only this URL needs to be used and the parameters simply have to be passed through.
If you are unable or do not want to use the supplied search parameters URL, you must add the tracking parameters to the search calls yourself.
You can inspect the log file analysis to determine how many search queries are generated by the Suggest module. To do this you need to ensure that such search queries are supplied with the parameter queryFromSuggest=true.
If you want to track what terms are suggested for what inputs, you also need to pass the original term entered by the user as the value for the parameter userInput. For example, if many users select “Paracetamol” from the list after typing “pa” then this entry will be ranked higher and will appear further up in the list."

As a practical example, you can check the conrad website, links after clicking on the suggest layer are like this:
http://www.conrad.biz/ce/de/brand/trendwerk77?queryFromSuggest=true

Please implement the Fact Finder standard tracking, accordingly.

Thank you,
Laura
item.summary: Suggestion layer - tracking

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Will, Please estimate, thx.

Hi all

Should be a simple implementation, just adding the parameter queryFromSuggest=true to all suggestion links and pass it through to FF in the FF request.

Cheers
Will

http://test.distrelec.ch/de/led-streifen-rgb-24-vdc-4000-mm-osram-ledstrip-flex-lf05ce-rgb1/p/11073195?q=*&filter_queryFromSuggest=true

?q=*&filter_queryFromSuggest=true triggers FF tracking request.

FF tracking request:

<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
    <soap:Body>
        <logInformation
            xmlns="http://ws69.webservice.adapters.factfinder.de"
            xmlns:ns2="http://ws69.webservice.factfinder.de">
            <in0>distrelec_Q_7310_ch_de</in0>
            <in1>
                <entry>
                    <key>sid</key>
                    <value>559902EA506D41329163220C3E712932</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>origPageSize</key>
                    <value>10</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>masterId</key>
                    <value>11073195</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>query</key>
                    <value>*</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>origPos</key>
                    <value>1</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>class</key>
                    <value>class com.namics.hybris.ffsearch.data.tracking.FactFinderTrackingData</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>pos</key>
                    <value>1</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>id</key>
                    <value>11073195</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>title</key>
                    <value>LED-Streifen RGB 24 VDC 4000 mm</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>page</key>
                    <value>1</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>event</key>
                    <value>click</value>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                    <key>channel</key>
                    <value>distrelec_Q_7310_ch_de</value>
                </entry>
            </in1>
            <in2>
                <ns2:password>c156fb175babbf953ee0c4c6e6abc855</ns2:password>
                <ns2:timestamp>1436184450538</ns2:timestamp>
                <ns2:username>webservice</ns2:username>
            </in2>
        </logInformation>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

FF tracking response:

<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <soap:Body>
        <ns1:logInformationResponse
            xmlns:ns1="http://ws69.webservice.adapters.factfinder.de">
            <ns1:out>true</ns1:out>
        </ns1:logInformationResponse>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
Committed to trunk (v3.6). Ready for Q deployment.

Hi,
I tested in CH_EN, for suggested "Search Terms" the tracking via the URL is not working, (see screenshot). Is there a reason why it was not implemented for the suggested "Search Terms"? If it does not have any consequences, please implement the same logic as well for "Search Term".

In addition, the "query from suggest" appears on the filter grouping area, "QueryFromSuggest" is only a tag in the URL, it must never be visible on the shop. (http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/19332/QueryFromSuggest_groupingarea.png)

Like this it cannot go live

Thank you
Laura

I have reverted this changes. 

r14249 | rhaemmerli | 2015-07-30 12:54:49 +0200 (Thu, 30 Jul 2015) | 3 lines

DISTRELEC-7028 revert commit 14021,14020

@Will

Please make a make of proper implementation of this.
René
Deployment of v3.6.2 to Q done, please test.

Hi Rafael

Can you give me a status update? Who did the implementation? What was changed?

Will

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6919] Movex - Punchoutfilter update issue
item.description:
The punchout filter update is probably not updating properly.
Similar problem like for the EOL issue.

If for example a file is sent to the shop which contains all the punchouts for a customer, then the second time a product is not included anymore in the punchouts then it should be removed from hybris. At the moment this only works if the valid to date is younger than today.
item.summary: Movex - Punchoutfilter update issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Implementation in trunk:
1. delete all punchouts
2. import all punchouts
3. run the sync job
I will clarify with the ERP team if they exporitng everytime all punchouts.

We require more inputs on Punchout filter update.

1, Is it incremental file or full load file.
2. If it is incremental file and the product is not included in punchout but exist in system and date is also valid then
i. Shall we delete all existing records data from punchoutfilter.
ii. if require to delete few products, then what is the valid criteria for deletion.

Hi Nitin

Once per day they send a FULL export.

Cheers
Will

Hi Will,

Please provide me more information on below -
1. How many files as ERP providing for PunchoutFilter load. I have seen two files erp_punchoutfilt_cu and erp_punchoutfilt_man. Please provide me other files for test the code changes.
2. I have observed below ITEM TYPE in distrelecB2Bcore-items.xml
a. DistPunchOutFilter
b. DistProductPunchOutFilter
c. DistSalesOrgPunchOutFilter
d. DistCUPunchOutFilter
e. DistCTPunchOutFilter
f. DistCOPunchOutFilter
g. DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter
I believe erp_punchoutfilt_man file belongs to DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter TYPE and erp_punchoutfilt_cu file belongs to DistCUPunchOutFilter TYPE. We will delete the records from particular TYPE based on file type. Please confirm on my understanding.
3. It seems it`s not Full load for PunchoutFilter, it is incremental load and full load for specific TYPE. Please confirm.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

Hi Nitin

The punchout API is defined by 4 files in the distrelecB2Bcore-spring-integration-erp.xml:

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCOConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update country punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCOPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];country(isocode)[unique=true];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{2};{3};{+4};{+5};{+6}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="type" value="DistCOPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCTConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				
				# Replace SAP codes by hybris codes:
				$customerTypeCodeMapping=[cellDecorator=com.namics.hybris.toolbox.impex.text.MultiReplaceTextDecorator][mapping-delimiter=->][replace-mapping0=Z100->B2B][replace-mapping1=Z200->B2C][replace-mapping2=COMPANY->B2B][replace-mapping3=PRIVATE->B2C]
				
				# Insert/Update customer type punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCTPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];customerType(code)[unique=true]$customerTypeCodeMapping;product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{+2};{+3};{+4}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="type" value="DistCTPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCUConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update customer punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCUPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{2};{3};{+4};{+5};{+6}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="rowFilter" ref="customerRowFilter" />
		<property name="type" value="DistCUPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>
	
	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterManufacturerConverter" class="com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultDistImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update customer punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];manufacturer(code)[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};man_{+2};{3};{+4};{+5}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="beforeEachConverting" ref="beforeEachPunchOutFilterManufacturer" />
		<property name="type" value="DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

We get every night a FULL export for each punchout type (that means 4 FULL export files). At the moment we only have data for two types, as you could only find 2 files.

You delete now the all the records according the file / punchout type. Thats the way to do it

If you want, we can do a quick review session in the afternoon.

Thx
Will

Hi Will,

I have validate the code changes with DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter file and it`s seem working fine but observed some data configuration related issue in DistCUPunchOutFilter file. Due to this system not importing DistCUPunchOutFilter file into the local system.

The code changes has been committed in trunk. Please test and validate the code changes.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

Hi Nitin

I quickly reviewed your changes. We should refactor this code for sure. We will test your changes on Q today.

Cheers
Will

Committed to trunk v4.1.0

Next steps:

  • refactoring

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6900] New Hero Teaser Size | Add "Distrelec Small Hero Rotating Component"
item.description:
Actual situation:
At the moment we have the following two Components:

  • Distrelec Hero Rotating Component
  • Distrelec Extended Hero Rotating Component

After several ABtests on our homepages it was decided to give the hero teasers slightly less importance, that's why we require an additional component -> Distrelec Small Hero Rotation Component

It's crucial that we add a new component and keep the existing two as they are.

New requirement:

  • Create Distrelec Small Hero Rotating Component in Hybris
  • The Component contains two main slots:
    • Hero Rotating Teaser Items (left side)
    • Linked Image Slot (right side)

Part 1: Hero Rotating Teaser Items:

  • Can be based on the Distrelec Extended Hero Rotating Teaser Component with following adaptations:
    • Change the size to 700x200px
    • Use the smaller icons (see attachments) for the forward/backward functionality and position them as shown in the attached mockups

Add a space of 20px between Part 1 and Part 2

Part 2: Linked Image Slot:

  • Add an image slot of 220x200px where we can upload one image per active language
  • Add functionality to add a Link (same as in Hero Teasers) going to:
    • Content Page
    • Category
    • Product
    • URL (language specific)

It should be possible to use this Component in Full width (100%) and also 66% width. If it's 66% the image on the right should not appear. (This requirement is necessary for the further homepage redesigns that will be coming soon with the catalogue browse on the left side)
item.summary: New Hero Teaser Size | Add "Distrelec Small Hero Rotating Component"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attached you find the small forward/backward buttons that should be used.
Attached you find the mockups for the new component
Hi Ruben, please let us know if this is feasible from FE perspective and add an estimation for FE in a comment, thx.

I think is not possible to have these 2 elements at the same time in a single component, so we have to use two:

  • Creation of "Distrelec Small Hero Rotation Component": 4h
  • We can use the already existing Link component for the banner on the right, with the new size.
  • Put everything in place: 4h

Total FE work around: 1d

Nice to have:

  • It would be nice to choose where we want to place the new Hero Teaser: left or right.
    Maybe with a new parameter in the Hybris component.

Nabil Benothman | Distrelecil, could you please estimate the BE impact?

Thanks

Hi,

BE work: 4h.
How soon will it be live???
Due to the Homepage redesign I had to change the measurements of the elements in this ticket. Thanks for your consideration. I will add new mockups soon.

Hi Marc!
Apparently the Hero Teaser allows 3 different sizes (screenshot).
Should be enough like this?
Thx

Hi Ruben.
No I think you're in the wrong HeroTeaserComponent. We actually need a new type of hero teaser (like when we did the extended hero rotating teaser component) and use the measurements mentioned in the specifications above.

Please test after the next deployment.
As we talked, the component will allow different width and height

item.description: Please fix the failed JUnit test.
item.summary: Fixing ProductDistCOPunchOutFilterElementConverterTest

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:

model.setProductHierarchy("asdf");
bamboo is green now
Status ?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6771] Display of categories according to type (L2, L2-3D, L3)
item.description:
As discussed with Nabil and Will, I have the question if it is possible to have the shop display (i.e. either the page with the octagons/tiles or the FF product list) based on the type of category? I.e. could we have the octagon display for all the L2-3D categories?

I once checked this with R. Husi and he said it will not work, as the L2-3D and some of the L3D levels are on the same category level (category 3 in FF). But Nabil and Will said they could look into it to find a solution.

Looking forward to an answer & thanks
/Daniela
item.summary: Display of categories according to type (L2, L2-3D, L3)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
What is responsible for displaying a category as cat overview:
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Diskrete-Halbleiter-R%C3%B6hren/c/cat-L2-3D_525337

or not:
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Diskrete-Halbleiter-R%C3%B6hren/Dioden/c/cat-L3D_525222

Hi Daniela

As discussed, to show a category as an overview OR as a product list page, we can simply set the "display as category page" property to true or false. This property can be found on the PIM Category Type, which is set on the category itself. It is not YET comming from PIM or ERP. We can just change it in the hmc.

Cheers
Will
As discussed, we will do a test with a new attribute for categories. JW will set it up in PIM Test and give you the file.

Create suffix list/icons for L3D Sub Category

  • L3D Sub Category_list
  • L3D Sub Category_icons

The new PIM attribute is responsible for the import to set a category to the type list or icons.

When the PIM file for DEV is ready I will start the implementation.
why is this blocked? ))
I'm blocked on this ticket until I have the PIM dev file from you

You are blocked but I am not...
On my side it is in Progress.

Some info about my Progress...
The new attribute has been created in PIM test @ 2015-05-12 10:45:16 by CHJWB.
So now I have to run an export.
And I am still not blocked
I did not change the status to blocked

Sorry I thought you did
I think we need a SharePoint interface to manage all actors statuses because you are blocked and I am in Progress.
Or a moving weighted average to qualify the ticket Status. This is really a very important issue. A blocker?

by the way
I ran a full Export of the yellow without manufacturers, Images...

In the meanwhile I start a basix XML Export of the yellow.
you get it in 30 mn.
J-W

Here we are with the 30 mn...
See attached XML. This is not a full Export. It is just an Export of the yellow structure.
The full will contain the same tags.
So you parse the MetaData tag of the node.
Then you pick up the value of the web_template01 Attribute
Then you apply a new page layout according to this flag.
have fun

<Classification ID="L2D_379524" UserTypeID="L2D Category">
<Name>Active Components</Name>
<AssetCrossReference AssetID="CL_2_iPhone" Type="iPhone Hierarchy Image"/>
<AssetCrossReference AssetID="CL_2_iPhone" Type="Primary Image"/>

<MetaData>
<Value AttributeID="web_template01">Icon</Value>
</MetaData>
Export of web classification. Only the web classification.

next step is adapting PIM import AbstractCategoryElementConverter.java:

    private DistPimCategoryTypeModel getPimCategoryType(final Element source) {
        final String code = getUserTypeId(source);
        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(code)) {
            LOG.debug("No user type set on xml element {}", new Object[] { source.asXML() });
            return null;
        }

        try {
            return codelistService.getDistPimCategoryType(code);
        } catch (final NotFoundException e) {
            LOG.debug("Could not get pim category type for code [{}]", new Object[] { code }, e);
            return null;
        }
    }

    private String getUserTypeId(final Element element) {
        return element.attributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_USER_TYPE_ID);
    }

Hi Jean-Wilfrid

Can you provide me a full testing file? I can come to you with an external HD to save it.

Thx
Will
Status?
I need to check with Nabil tomorrow 03.06.2015 10:30 with Nabil. I have a problem in reading the XML tag.

impex:

INSERT_UPDATE DistPimCategoryType;code[unique=true];name[lang=en];visible;categoryPage;categoryWithSimilarProducts
;icon-L2-3D Cluster;L2-3D Cluster;true;true;false
;list-L2-3D Cluster;L2-3D Cluster;true;false;false
;icon-L2D Category;L2D Category;true;true;false
;list-L2D Category;L2D Category;true;false;false
;icon-L3D Sub Category;L3D Sub Category;true;true;false
;list-L3D Sub Category;L3D Sub Category;true;false;false
;icon-L1D Section;L1D Section;true;true;false
;list-L1D Section;L1D Section;true;false;false

    <Attribute ID="web_template01" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Property" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Referenced="true">
      <Name>Web List / icon</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="20" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value Derived="true" AttributeID="CalcColHead">Web List / icon</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="web_classification"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="L3D Sub Category"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="L2D Category"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="L1D Section"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="L2-3D Cluster"/>
    </Attribute>
Hi Will, please update the remaining estimate, thx.
Hi Rafael, it is up to date.
Need to wait for the file from Patrick Zubler.
Got the file from Patrick.

Hi Adrian

Can we have a look at this ticket together? Nabil and me were not able to read the required information "web_template01" from the PIM xml.

Maybe you can help us here.

Thx
Will

Hi all,

In the current state, there is nothing to do from shop side. Some categories have an attribute called "PIM Category Type" which contains a flag saying whether we should display the category Page (with octagons) or the product list page. This attribute is coming already from PIM. Therefore, we can play with this "PIM Category Type" by either changing its value to another existing one or, if needed, create new specific ones.

BR,
/Nabil.

Hi Nabil

But this is not what we've been discussing and what is needed from PIM/business side. It was discussed that the display of the categories is defined by the "web_template01" so that the display can be defined via attributes, which can differ from context to context (as different needs might arise in different countries). There was a test with this attribute and the status I got from Will was that it is tested on Hybris side how to integrate this attribute so that the display changes.

As it is the basis for the cataloge browse phase 2, it's very important that this is fixed as soon as possible.

/Daniela

Hi Daniela,

I know what we discussed. The problem with the PIM import is that it is not channel/country dependent and it is only language dependent. As I discussed with JW, to make PIM import country dependent requires a lot of changes from our side.

Hi Nabil

This will have to be done, anyway, at some point or another, if we want to have a flexible system. The search data, for instance, is country dependent and if we do not implement it this way, we will lose or not use a lot of potential.

Another possibility is to create - again - a workaround in PIM so that you get several attributes in the same feed (could also be done with the search data with the consequence that the export will blow up) and you have to assign the right information to the right context. I think that a context dependent solution with nice partial imports/exports would be the most flexible solution. But this discussion should maybe be lead in a different context than in a Jira ticket.

/Daniela

Hi Daniela,

As a quick solution we can use this "web_template_XX" to map to a country (or SalesOrg) with a category and set the flag. However, If we need more sophisticated solution (not only for categories) to have a channel/country (SalesOrg) dependencies, then it will require a big change also in the PIM import.

For the quick solution we need a mapping between the "web_template_XX" and the countries (or SalesOrg)

Hi Nabil

What exactly do you mean with a mapping, resp. what should it look like and where should it be done?

/Daniela

Hi Daniela,

it should be done in PIM. Please assign the ticket to JW.

/Nabil.

Hi Nabil

Can you please first make sure that when the flag is sent from PIM it really triggers the correct display in hybris? I think we discuss now about details, which will need to have a global solution (i.e. context dependent data). However, for the further course of the catalogue browse project, they need to know if the different display of different levels via the attribute can be done or not.

In the worst case they will start out with a non-context-dependent solution, but they need to know if they can have different levels of navigation or not. Otherwise, they are blocked in their work.

/Daniela

Hi Daniela,
As I said, we can implement a solution that consider the country for category display based on the "web_template_XX" parameter that we receive from PIM.

/Nabil.

Hi Nabil

Well, then let`s go for it!

/Daniela

Hi Daniela,

Please check this first with the PIM team.

Hi Nabil

What has to be checked? The tag is there and all we`d like to know is if this can be "translated" into different displays in hybris. That is really all we need to know...

/Daniela

Nabil identified the import issue here, he knows how to solve it. In a next step I will check with David if we should implement this feature. FF team would like to have it. PIM team I dont know. I will clarify and update the ticket asap.

Hi Will

Just a quick comment: it's not the FF team that wants this feature - it's a requirement to enable the catalogue browse project team to make their idea(s) come true. Without this feature, they will have to start from scratch and make a very inflexible categorization. Having looked at other possible solutions, this one is the easiest to both implement and on the long term to maintain.

Just in case someone is against implementing it: this we'd need to discuss together, as it really is business relevant that we get the possibility to define individual depths of navigation.

/Daniela
Ticket solved in v4.1.0, committed to trunk. Ready for Q deployment.

comments.comment: Hi Ruben, please estimate ,thx.
Rafael Burlet | Distrelec We need that paper plane icon
Please test after v4.1.0 deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4824] Product Detail Page: Display full breadcrumb when coming via search
item.description:
D.07 - When choosing a product from the search results, the breadcrumbs do not show the category to which the product belongs. Instead the breadcrumbs link to ""Custom Filter"".
User Quote:""When a product has been searched and found, the category can't be clicked on, because it always shows 'custom filter'."" "

The breadcrumbs should show the category to which the product belongs. So when entering via search, display the product category and additionally offer a link back to the search result set.

In addition, do not show /.../ but always display the full breadcrumb, as this is more user friendly.
item.summary: Product Detail Page: Display full breadcrumb when coming via search

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Should be refactored togehter with DISTRELEC-4845
Estimation for both: ca. 2d

Hi Daniela,
As discussed, this will be implemented with http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4845.
Can we close this ticket?

Hello,
I've received feedback that customers get confused with the /.../ in the breadcrumb. Display always the full breadcrumb as it was requested.
Thanks,
Laura

Hello Laura

I don't think that there is enough space to display the full breadcrumb.
Do you have an idea how this should look like?

Hello Rene
Just display the full breadcrumb, and use as many lines as needed. In the screenshot attached you see the full breadcrumb, it should display always like this (including searching, navigating, product detail pages)

@Nitin

Can you please take care of this

Hi Reben,

I have checked the logic in BE side and observed at FE side we have implemented the logic to hide the complete Breadcrumb URL.

Can you please look into this.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh
Please test after the deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7769] Change Content Page With Navigation Template
item.description: Change the Content Page With Navigation Template for the catalog browse rollout and move the navigation part to the right and the content part to the left.
item.summary: Change Content Page With Navigation Template

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: Hi Ruben Diaz Roman | Distrelec, can you please estimate this?

Hi Marc Kraft | Distrelec,
it's a matter of minutes. But let's sit together to do it
Please test after the next deployment

Deployment of v4.0.9 to Q done.

Please test!

Hi Ruben,
I don't see a change yet. This page is with navigation, but it's still on the left side of the content. Also when I create a new page by using the template with navigation there's no change yet (see printscreen). Can you have a look again?

Hi Marc,
Sorry, my mistake.
The correct fix version is v4.1.0

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7500] availability calculated in wrong way
item.description:
With the interface IF-03 Stock SAP sends stock information from our suppliers. For these cases the warehouse code is EF71 or ES71. Acutally SAP sends this Information to the shop but the stock is not displayed on the web.
Example Material 30019168. File is attached.
According to Francesco he was able to see this stock information in Hybris but also not on the web.
item.summary: availability calculated in wrong way

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Test case:
product: 30019168
stock information file:

MaterialNo Warehouse Available Next_delivery_date Next_delivery_amount Timestamp_modificat
30019168 7351 0   0 20150824093428
30019168 7371 0   0 20150824093428
30019168 EF51 33 20150825 0 20150824093428
30019168 EF71 33 20150825 0 20150824093428
30019168 ES71 0 20150826 0 20150824093428

Hi Rafael, please take care about this issue urgently.
Many thanks
Urs

Hi René, could you take care about this issue, please? We have to solve that asap.
Many thanks
Urs

@Urs

Can you please describe the problem and if possible the solution?
I don't see any of it in this ticket.
Please see my notes in the description of the ticket.

As agreed with Urs and Evangelos

  1. enable EF71, ES71,EF51, ES51 on Q for Germany
  2. import the data & test
  3. agree with the business about the solution
  4. update the documentation
    • http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistSalesOrg
    • http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+Warehouse
  5. implement ad deploy to P

@Neeraj

Can you please:

  1. enable EF71, ES71,EF51, ES51 on Q for Germany

EFxx warehouse (EF = external fast)
ESxx warehouse (ES = external slow)

Hi Rene Haemmerli | Distrelec :-

I have enabled EF71, ES71,EF51, ES51 on Q for Germany.
Let me know if you want me to commit these impex. So that it will be part of impex during the p import as well.

Thanks

Q is ready for testing.
